department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: curved club that widens to the top; top holds a ball and is shaped like a stylized beak; engraved with the head of a beaked creature on either side of top; trefoliate designs on a running vine down one side; other side depicts 3 fish, 3 soliders and a figure on a horse; one nail on either side repairing a split in the wood; hole through end of handle
title: Ball-headed Club
